channel.title: Correspondences between SUD and UD on SUD
channel.description: Recent content in Correspondences between SUD and UD on SUD

item.title: Conversion from UD to SUD
item.description: This page describes the process used in the conversion from UD to SUD. It also explains how this can be adapted to languages specificities. The main sequence Onf (eud_to_ud): Remove all enhanced annotation; the conversion supposes that the input is in basic UD format. Note that it can be safely applied to basic UD, the annotations are left unchanged. Onf (idioms): Add the features encoding of idioms in SUD; namely, features ExtPos, PhraseType, InTitle and InIdiom ( see Idioms and titles).
